title: Rainy night city driving, almost stopped, pedestrian crossing.
caption: A rainy night city street with the ego vehicle almost stopped and a pedestrian crossing.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNight). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The video shows a rainy night city street with the ego vehicle almost stopped. There are several other cars on the road, some of them are moving slowly. A pedestrian is crossing the street at a crosswalk. The road is wet and visibility is reduced due to the rain.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because of the rainy weather conditions. It is approaching a pedestrian crossing and the driver is likely to stop the vehicle to let the pedestrian pass safely. The driver needs to be cautious and maintain a safe distance from other vehicles on the road to avoid any accidents.
